request.description:
Get all reviews for a course. Supports pagination, sorting, and filtering by rating.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (optional): Items per page (default: 10)
- `sortBy` (optional): Field to sort by (default: createdAt)
- `sortOrder` (optional): Sort order - asc/desc (default: desc)
- `rating` (optional): Filter by specific rating (1-5)

**Authorization:** No authentication required (public)

variable.description: ID of the course to review

request.description:
Create a review for a course. Requires authentication. Users must be enrolled in the course. One review per user per course.

**Request Body:**
- `rating` (required): Integer between 1-5
- `comment` (optional): Review text

**Authorization:** Any authenticated user (enrolled in course)

variable.description: ID of the review to delete

request.description:
Delete a course review. Requires authentication.

**Authorization:** Review owner OR ADMIN role

**Authorization:** Admin only
